data.name: NASCAR Heat 2 - December Value Pack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy a total of 14 new paint schemes, including some from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, NASCAR XFINITY Series, and NASCAR Camping World Truck Series. This NASCAR Heat 2 - December Value Pack features schemes of drivers like Dale Earnhardt, Jr., Kevin Harvick, and Austin Cindric.

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Dale Earnhardt Jr. #88 Nationwide Gray Ghost (Martinsville)
Kurt Busch #41 State Water Heaters (Martinsville)
…
NXS:
Kevin Harvick #41 Textron Offroad / Stampede (Atlanta)
Michael Annett #5 Allstate Parts & Services (Mid-Ohio)
…
CWTS:
Austin Cindric #19 FitzGerald Glider Kits (Eldora)
Chase Briscoe #29 BK CFF (Gateway)

This content is also included in the 2017 Hot Pass!

data.short_description: Enjoy a total of 14 new paint schemes, including some from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, NASCAR XFINITY Series, and NASCAR Camping World Truck Series. This NASCAR Heat 2 - December Value Pack features schemes of drivers like Dale Earnhardt, Jr., Kevin Harvick, and Austin Cindric.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better
